Summary: 3rd time I have seen this triangle shape in the sky in south east direction?
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the 3rd time I have seen this triangle shape in the sky in south east direction? I noticed it a few weeks ago and I reported it and logged it the 2nd and 3rd time, the 1st time I could not belive my eyes but now I am sure it is a U.F.O it moves in all types of direction in very fast and sudden movements it has lights that are red, yellow, green, blue and white it appears to be very big atleast the size of two foot ball fields, if you were traveling east on route 27 toward Augusta and looked to the left You can notice a very bright light and triangular shape that moves very sudden and fast but alos has the ability to hover in a area for very long periods of time it is usually near the big dipper in the sky but much brighter with radiant lights that strobe...
trends: There has been one other sighting in Wiscasset
There were no other sightings in Wiscasset on or around March 10th 2010
